hero.title: Transform Sustainability into Strategic Advantage
hero.subtitle: AI-driven platform that integrates sustainability and profitability into a unified discipline. Discover the power of EROI - Environmental Return on Investment.
hero.description: Humblify revolutionizes strategic decision-making in capital-intensive industries through radical transparency and disciplined sustainability integration.
hero.trustIndicator: Trusted by capital-intensive industries in energy, manufacturing, and infrastructure
hero.marketStats: €2+ billion market, 28% CAGR for AI-driven ESG solutions

problem.title: Data Overflow, Insight Deficit
problem.subtitle: Capital-intensive industries generate massive data volumes but lack integrated tools to transform fragmented information into strategic competitive advantages.

fragmentedSystems.title: Fragmented Systems
fragmentedSystems.description: Financial, Environmental, and Social data trapped in isolated silos, preventing holistic strategic planning and integrated decision-making

hiddenRisks.title: Hidden Risks
hiddenRisks.description: Stranded assets, regulatory risks (CSRD, EU Taxonomy), and environmental liabilities invisible in traditional financial calculations

suboptimalDecisions.title: Suboptimal Decisions
suboptimalDecisions.description: Missing integration of externalities and sustainability factors leads to reduced long-term profitability and competitive disadvantage

problem.resultMessage: Result: Suboptimal decisions, elevated risks, and missed opportunities in a rapidly changing regulatory landscape

solution.title: EROI: The Unifying Force
solution.subtitle: Our proprietary Environmental Return on Investment methodology quantifies environmental impact in financial terms, integrating sustainability as a unified discipline in all strategic decisions.
solution.description: Powered by our AI Multi-Agent System that orchestrates data integration, analysis, and strategic communication for radical transparency.

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.description: Glass Box AI vs Black Box - Complete auditability through ExplanationTree methodology

integration.title: Integrated Decision-Making
integration.description: ESG and financial analysis unified into a single disciplined approach to strategic planning

predictive.title: Predictive Risk Management
predictive.description: Advanced modeling of regulatory, environmental, and transition risks before they impact operations

profitability.title: Sustainable Profitability
profitability.description: Long-term value creation through disciplined sustainability integration and risk-adjusted returns

benefits.integration: Complete integration of ESG data in investment calculations and strategic planning
benefits.riskReduction: Proactive reduction of regulatory, environmental, and stranded asset risks
benefits.transparency: Radical transparency through quantified insights and complete audit trails
benefits.aiSystem: AI Multi-Agent orchestration for seamless data processing and strategic insights

process.eroiCalculation: Environmental Return on Investment calculation with shadow pricing
process.strategicIntegration: Integration into strategic planning with predictive risk modeling

testimonials.title: Proven Impact
testimonials.subtitle: Leading companies have already transformed their strategic decisions with Humblify

eroiLab.title: EROI Lab: Interactive Calculator
eroiLab.subtitle: Explore how different investment parameters affect your Environmental Return on Investment through our advanced modeling system
eroiLab.description: Experience radical transparency - see exactly how environmental factors integrate with financial calculations in real-time.
eroiLab.uniqueValue: Unlike traditional calculators, our EROI Lab provides complete transparency into how environmental factors integrate with financial metrics - the glass box approach to sustainable investment analysis.
